mapper.select: select exam_paper_allocation_id from exam_paper_allocation inner join exam_paper_release on exam_paper_allocation.exam_paper_release_id = exam_paper_release.exam_paper_release_id where student_id=#{studentId} and exam_paper_allocation_state=2 order by exam_start_time desc limit 1
select count(student_id) from exam_paper_allocation where student_id=#{studentId} and exam_paper_allocation_state=2
